mapper.sql: shop_id, shop_name, logo_url, opening_time,longitude, latitude, address, location, intro,phone, mobile_phone, state,mark, des, account_shop_id, shop_category_id, shop_qr_code_url
mapper.select: select shop.shop_id,shop_name,logo_url,score,monthly_sales_volume, longitude,latitude from shop left join shop_message on shop.shop_id = shop_message.shop_id left join account_shop on shop.account_shop_id = account_shop.id where #{3} <= account_shop.use_end_time and shop.shop_id not in (select shop.shop_id from shop left join shop_message on shop.shop_id = shop_message.shop_id right join account_focus on shop.shop_id = account_focus.shop_id where shop.mark = #{0} and account_focus.account_token = #{1}) and shop.mark = #{0} order by ${2}

select shop.shop_id,shop_name,logo_url,score,monthly_sales_volume, longitude,latitude from shop left join shop_message on shop.shop_id = shop_message.shop_id left join account_shop on shop.account_shop_id = account_shop.id where shop.mark = #{0} and #{2} <= account_shop.use_end_time order by #{1}

select shop_.shop_id,shop_.shop_name,shop_.logo_url,shop_.score,shop_.monthly_sales_volume, shop_.longitude,shop_.latitude,shop_.mark from (select shop.shop_id,shop_name,logo_url,score,monthly_sales_volume, longitude,latitude,mark from shop left join shop_message on shop.shop_id = shop_message.shop_id ) as shop_ left join
takeout_product on shop_.shop_id = takeout_product.shop_id
buy_package on shop_.shop_id = buy_package.shop_id
where shop_.mark = #{mark} and shop_.shop_name like concat('%',#{keyWord},'%')
or takeout_product.product_name like concat('%', #{keyWord}, '%') group by shop_id
or buy_package.package_name like concat('%', #{keyWord}, '%') group by shop_id
where shop_.mark = #{mark} group by shop_id

select shop.shop_id,shop_name,logo_url,score,monthly_sales_volume, delivery_fee, longitude,latitude,mark,mobile_phone,shop.account_shop_id,shop.location, shop.address, shop.shop_qr_code_url from shop left join shop_message on shop.shop_id = shop_message.shop_id where 1=1 and shop.shop_id = #{shopId}

select shop.shop_id,shop_name,logo_url,score,monthly_sales_volume, longitude,latitude,mark,shop_category_id from shop left join shop_message on shop.shop_id = shop_message.shop_id where 1=1 and shop.shop_category_id = #{0} and shop.mark = #{1}

select
from shop where mark = #{1} limit #{0}, 1
select shop.*, shop.gmt_create as shop_join_time from shop left join account_shop on shop.account_shop_id = account_shop.id where account_shop.token = #{accountShopToken} limit 1
